bibl.title: Ptolemaic Queens with a Triple Uraeus.
bibl.note: Seven Egyptian-type royal portrait heads and statues have been attributed to Cleopatra VII on the basis of the triple uraeus. The author discusses the possible meaning(s) of the triple uraeus and concludes that it cannot refer to Cleopatra VII.
bibl.seg: MAEHLER Herwig, Ptolemaic Queens with a Triple Uraeus.

Seven Egyptian-type royal portrait heads and statues have been attributed to Cleopatra VII on the basis of the triple uraeus. The author discusses the possible meaning(s) of the triple uraeus and concludes that it cannot refer to Cleopatra VII.
